Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
genocide \gen"o*cide\ n. The systematic killing of a racial or cultural group; as, the Nazi genocide of Jews left few in Germany or Poland after World War II.
Syn: race murder, racial extermination. [WordNet 1.5]
genocide n : systematic killing of a racial or cultural group [syn: {race murder}, {racial extermination}]
